original_text: But I say to you, Do not resist the one who is evil. But if anyone slaps you on the right cheek, turn to him the other also.
korean_text: 나는 너희에게 이르노니 악한 자를 대적하지 말라 누구든지 네 오른편 뺨을 치거든 왼편도 돌려 대며

sentences.original_text: Do not resist the one who is evil.
But if anyone slaps you on the right cheek,
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 누가 네 오른편 뺨을 치거든,

sentences.original_text: turn to him the other also.
